topics.body:
Dinosaurs plus humans! Crossing over billions of years to protect the world... History's strongest brave team has now arrived!  Listen and be amazed by their magnificence!

*ZYUDEN SENTAI KYORYUGER!!*

Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa... Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa...
Oretachi wa muteki no *SUPERSTAR*
Atsui *SPIRITS FULL* juden mune ga sawagu ze
Densetsu wo nori-konase *WONDERFUL*
*BRAVE* wo damaraseru na itsumo *CHALLENGER*
Honto no tsuyosa wa ittai doko ni aru to iu no darou?
Chikyugi wo mawasu yori mo kokoro no naka wo sagase! (Yacchaouze!)
Gaburincho! Meccha Mucho! Arete yaru ze kyou mo (*FIRE!*)
Ikuze, Kyoryuger!
Buttobasso! Yancha motto!
Acchi kocchi kami-tsuite dare no mo tomerarenai
Kiite migoto odoroke!
Zyuden Sentai Vamola! Kyoryuger! (Whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa whoa)
*BRAVE IN!!*
